description: This file defines the Angular component 'PostsComponent' which manages the UI and interactions related to displaying, editing, saving, deleting, and marking social media posts as posted within the social media automation dashboard.

classes.name: PostsComponent
classes.description: Angular component responsible for managing and displaying scheduled social media posts, including editing, saving, deleting, and marking posts as posted.

methods.name: toggleEdit
methods.description: Toggles the editing state for a given post.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves updates to a post via the data service and exits edit mode.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a post by its ID using the data service.

methods.name: markPosted
methods.description: Marks a post as posted via its ID.
